LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.label: Steel Slag Chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.description: A rough glob of metal that has been melted from extreme temperatures. It can be smelted into alloy at an electric smelter.
LanguageData.Sandstone.label: Sandstone Deposit
LanguageData.Sandstone.description: Sandstone is a sedimentary rock that is composed of sand particles that have been compressed together.
LanguageData.SmoothedSandstone.label: smoothed sandstone
LanguageData.SmoothedSandstone.description: A sedimentary rock composed of sand particles compressed together. The sand layers have been polished to a flat, smooth surface.
LanguageData.ChunkSandstone.label: Sandstone Chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSandstone.description: Sandstone is a sedimentary rock that is composed of sand particles that have been compressed together. This is a large chunk of rock that can be cut into blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksSandstone.label: sandstone blocks
LanguageData.BlocksSandstone.description: Blocks of solid sandstone. Sandstone is a relatively soft rock and chips easily.
LanguageData.Granite.label: Granite Deposit
LanguageData.Granite.description: Granite is a very hard igneous rock.
LanguageData.SmoothedGranite.label: smoothed granite
LanguageData.SmoothedGranite.description: A very hard igneous rock. The shining surface is filled with a mosaic of black, white, and pink speckles.
LanguageData.ChunkGranite.label: Granite Chunk
LanguageData.ChunkGranite.description: Granite is a very hard igneous rock. This is a large chunk of rock that can be cut into blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksGranite.label: granite blocks
LanguageData.BlocksGranite.description: Blocks of solid granite. Granite is a very hard stone.
LanguageData.Limestone.label: Limestone Deposit
LanguageData.Limestone.description: Limestone is a sedimentary rock formed from the compacted remains of ancient seashells.
LanguageData.SmoothedLimestone.label: smoothed limestone
LanguageData.SmoothedLimestone.description: A sedimentary rock formed from the compacted remains of ancient seashells. It glows a smooth white, with light patterns of impurities suspended within.
LanguageData.ChunkLimestone.label: Limestone Chunk
LanguageData.ChunkLimestone.description: Limestone is a sedimentary rock formed from the compacted remains of ancient seashells. This is a large chunk of rock that can be cut into blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksLimestone.label: limestone blocks
LanguageData.Slate.label: Slate Deposit
LanguageData.Slate.description: Slate is a dark-colored metamorphic rock. Its fine layers are emblematic of slaty cleavage.
LanguageData.SmoothedSlate.label: smoothed slate
LanguageData.SmoothedSlate.description: A dark-colored metamorphic rock. Its fine layers are emblematic of slaty cleavage. Interior strata are clearly visible through the polished surface.
LanguageData.ChunkSlate.label: Slate Chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSlate.description: Slate is a dark-colored metamorphic rock. Its fine layers are emblematic of slaty cleavage. This is a large chunk of rock that can be cut into blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksSlate.label: slate blocks
LanguageData.BlocksSlate.description: Blocks of solid slate. A dull-looking rock that chips easily.
LanguageData.Marble.label: Marble Deposit
LanguageData.Marble.description: Marble is a soft metamorphic rock composed of recrystallized carbonate minerals. It is commonly used in sculptures.
LanguageData.SmoothedMarble.label: smoothed marble
LanguageData.SmoothedMarble.description: A soft metamorphic rock. This semi-transparent rock almost appears to glow with its own inner light.
LanguageData.ChunkMarble.label: Marble Chunk
LanguageData.ChunkMarble.description: Marble is a soft metamorphic rock composed of recrystallized carbonate minerals. It is commonly used in sculptures. This is a large chunk of rock that can be cut into blocks.
LanguageData.BlocksMarble.label: marble blocks
LanguageData.BlocksMarble.description: Blocks of solid marble. Marble is a soft, beautiful stone, known for being easy to sculpt.
